Pre-Game Insights: Croatia suffered a 2-1 loss to Portugal in their opening match of the 2024/25 UEFA Nations League.
Poland managed a dramatic 3-2 victory over Scotland at Hampden Park in their opening match.
Luka Modric remains the captain of Croatia, with Ivan Perisic as vice-captain.

Poland's victory against Scotland included a goal from range by Sebastian Szymanski and two penalties, one of which was scored by Robert Lewandowski and the other by Nicola Zalewski in the 97th minute.
Croatia's coach Zlatko Dalic changed to a back three formation for their match against Portugal.
Poland appears to have a better balance under the management of Michal Probierz, with clear wing-backs and creative support from Sebastian Szymanski to Piotr Zielinski.
Predicted Croatia XI (3-5-1-1): Livakovic; Sutalo, Pongracic, Gvardiol; Jakic, Modric, Kovacic, Baturina, Sosa; Pasalic; Kramaric.
Predicted Poland XI (3-5-2): Bulka; Bednarek, Dawidowicz, Kiwior; Frankowski, Szymanski, Urbanski, Zielinski, Zalewski; Piatek, Lewandowski.
The match is expected to be a low-scoring affair, with a tip of under 3.5 goals.
